name: Ken
description: I will become stronger! A lively fist-fighter
story: Born an orphan, Ken has faced many hardships in his life, but manages to maintain a bright and optimistic personality. He believes the only way to survive is through strength, and dedicates his life to training and always admires the strong.

relations.description: Ken wants to repay Cartuja for helping save him from a life of wandering.
They became friendly while working as mercenaries. Sven's constant demands to join his mercenary company is grating on Ken's nerves a little.

specialty.name: Victory Is Ours
specialty.description: Exuding confidence, no one can defeat him in this battle.

type.name: Strong Leader
type.description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.

costs.description: A scale fragment emanating incredible power. It is said that if the weak touch it, they will be killed instantly in an explosion of energy.

skills.name: Knockout
skills.description: Attacks with a flurry of strikes, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Burns the enemy for 2 turns when the caster is granted vigor. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Celestial Kick
skills.description: Kicks the enemy, decreasing Defense for 2 turns before granting the caster increased Speed for 2 turns. Gains 40 Fighting Spirit when an enemy is defeated. When the caster is granted vigor, ignores Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Phoenix Flurry
skills.description: Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, stunning for 1 turn. Grants vigor to the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Starts the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit, and gains 5 Fighting Spirit when attacked.
skills.enhanced_description: Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, decreasing Attack for 2 turns and stunning for 1 turn. Grants vigor to the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Starts the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit, and gains 5 Fighting Spirit when attacked.

buffs.name: Vigor
buffs.effect: Increases Attack and Defense by 30%. Cannot be dispelled.

debuffs.name: Burn
debuffs.effect: Target receives huge damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

skill1.name: 天極拳
skill1.desc:
敵単体に攻撃し、50%の確率で防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与する。
【覇気】状態の場合、対象に火傷を2ターンの間付与する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 天舞脚
skill2.desc:
敵単体に攻撃し、防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与し、自身にスピードUPを2ターンの間付与する。
このスキルで敵を気絶させた時【闘志】を40獲得する。
【覇気】状態の場合、効果抵抗を無視する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
skill2.soul_description:
敵単体に攻撃し、防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与し、自身にスピードUPを2ターンの間付与する。
このスキルで敵を気絶させた時【闘志】を40獲得する。
【覇気】状態の場合、効果抵抗を無視する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill3.name: 炎邏覇凰拳
skill3.desc:
敵単体に攻撃し、スタンを1ターンの間付与する。自身が3ターンの間【覇気】状態になる。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
初回のバトル開始時、【闘志】を50獲得する。攻撃を受けた時、【闘志】を5獲得する。
